descriptionHtml:
This archive contains ONLY textures and meshes!If you have \"grey head\" bug this files should help.
ESP file is available here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=128054427
DAWNGUARD and LAST PATCH REQUIRED!!!
Tussurradad Aundae is old vampire-pyromage.He is NOT marriable.I removed this option to avoid bugs with quest \"The Gift\".

+Leveling: 20-83 (slightly faster leveling than Dovahkiin)

+Skills: 
-Onehanded
-Light Armor
-Destruction (fire)
-Conjuration (Summon Fire Atronach)
-Alteration
-Restoration

+Location:
Near Redoran\'s Retreat.
Look at the screenshots in steam workshop for more detailed information. http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=128054427
author: Hebephryo
